promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute legendary goat steel-type pokemon wearing metallic bracers. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Braceram, a a chibi cute legendary goat steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Vengeful Stomp, Doom Desire. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "steel" or "Braceram". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, goat-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey galaxy background
generatedDescription: This adorable chibi legend wanders deserts, using its Vengeful Stomp to ward off foes before unleashing its Doom Desire—a lively protector!
